speaker: President. −
english:
President. − The next item is the debate ( A6-0269/2008 ) on the report by André Brie, on behalf of the Committee on Foreign Affairs, on Stabilisation of Afghanistan: challenges for the EU and the international community
[ 2007/2208(INI) ].

agenda_item: Stabilisation of Afghanistan: challenges for the EU and the international community (debate)
